channel.title: Character null + source question
channel.description: whenever i load my client up, i login and my character nulls. It deletes the character file (username.txt) and re-creates a blank one so i have to start over again. heres the error [img]http://C:\Documents and Settings\BRANDON\My Documents\My Pictures\rsps error.jpg[/img] and also, where do find the code that makes it so only one client can work with it?

item.title: Character null + source question
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

but i dont see a picture? just the box with triangles and a green circle…what do type in between the [/img] and [img]? i put C:\Documents and Settings\User\My Documents\My Pictures\rsps error.jpg

Read full topic

item.title: Character null + source question
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

LOL I tried showing but it keeps thinking I want to post a picture so I’m going to tell you backwards…do [/img] to end. To start add the URL of the picture next to [img]

Read full topic

i am using the official client…umm, how do u post an image using the img] [/img thingys…like what u put in there?
